system.availability: Victim makes -10 Toughness Test, if failed they suffer 1d10 Temprary Strength Damage, +1d10 per Degree of Failiure on Test. If they reach 0 Strength as a result they are completely paralysed. This paralysis and any damage to strength wear off after 2d5-TB Minutes (minimum 1 minute). (TB is victim's Toughness Bonus)
